website_summaries.verdict: This set of 2 tongs is made with stainless steel and comes in both 9- and 12-inch lengths. The nonslip rubber handles give you excellent grip and comfort while you're cooking.
pros: They each have hanging loops for easy storage
cons: Some have said they are a bit too flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these for a few months now and have found them to be a step up in quality versus their earlier products- these have been rust-free after dozens of cycles in our dishwasher and are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Wishful

customer_reviews.title: Old tings broke so I bought these
customer_reviews.text: Updated. These tongs broke. Both of them. The rivits that holds them together came out of the holes. Also the spring was rusting My old tongs finally broke from corrosion. I needed something fast and decided to get these. Was very pleased as they arrived quickly and seem to be made with quality. They were heavier than expected and the end of the tongue’s seems to be made of a pretty heavy gauge material. Was very pleased with the purchase Hopefully they last
customer_reviews.author: Big E

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Don’t bother if you really cook. These failed after two years of normal use. First the rubber grips disintegrated then the locking and hinge mechanism completely fell apart. Maybe two year seems like a long time and I’m being too harsh but keep in mind that the tongs I bought at a restaurant supply store more than a decade ago and have the most simply slide lock and no grips are still going strong almost 15 years later with continual daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Element owner

customer_reviews.title: They Worked Great - Until they Did Not
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with the tong set, they seemed robustly made and functioned as expected. However, then I noticed that the spring was beginning to rust, I tried to use a WD 40 product on the spring, but every time we washed the tongs after use, rust returned. Eventually the spring rusted through and the tongs because useless. I cannot recommend this product until the manufacture replaces the carbon steel spring with stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Beast From The East

customer_reviews.title: Nice BBQ Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I needed new BBQ tongs, so I ordered a pair from Dragonn. I tried them out the first night and found them to work very well. I particularly like that they lock in the closed position when not used, making storage much less space consuming. It is recommended to have two tongs, one for the raw food, the other for final removal to avoid potential contamination. I would have preferred two large tongs, but these are great as they are.
customer_reviews.author: RSH

customer_reviews.title: My wife prefers them to the ones with silicone on the tip as they grab and hold items better.
customer_reviews.text: These are solid high quality tongs. My wife prefers them to the ones with silicone on the tip as they grab and hold items better.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bingham

customer_reviews.title: A must have if using cookware with ceramic coating.
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced all my cookware with pots and pans, skillet, griddle with copper titanium infused ceramic coating. A dream come true. Nothing sticks, ever. But any kind of metal utensils are a definite NO NO !! Vinyl, plastic, rubber coated utensils are a must. These fit the bill perfectly. I really like the locking feature. They store neatly in their drawer, much better than non-locking ones. The rubber coated gripping area will not mar or scratch the ceramic surfaces. The grips are nicely fitted with thick rubber grips, very comfortable and secure to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of tongs maybe 10 or more years ago that served me well. The last of the set was still in good shape but the spring mechanism was so rusted that it no longer sprang open during use. I bought a set a few years ago that had silicon tips but they seemed to melt if I accidentally touched the side of a hot pan. I love that these have metal tips and they work great and at a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of tongs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of 9" and 12" tongs for barbecue grill use. The massive 16" pair I had bought from WalMart snapped in two after 6 months of use! These look sturdier and the locking mechanism is smooth and secure. Also, a small but thoughtful detail ... the hanger ring is offset to one side, making these tongs easy to hang even on a short screw or nail.
customer_reviews.author: tds

customer_reviews.title: To me these are wonderful! I have a silicon tong like the small ...
customer_reviews.text: To me these are wonderful! I have a silicon tong like the small one here and they are useless for picking up something like a hot pork chop in a skillet...the chop slides right out of its grip. So silicone picking up a bit of weight that is slippery doesn't work. That bring me to the "DRAGONN" set! They are brushed s.s.,light weight, nicely scalloped, hand grips are nice and have indentions for thumb and finger hold, the inside is opened enough for easy cleaning and easy open-close-space and storage. "TMI" sorry...I have never been one that could just "GTTP" :)
customer_reviews.author: calaw

customer_reviews.title: Good grip, locking end, stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are excellent. They’re durable, stainless steel, and just enough silicone spots for grip but not so much that they’re difficult to clean. The end of the tongs has an easy to pull ring that locks the tongs closed for storage. My favorite part of this feature is they don’t close completely when they’re locked. This means they’ll properly air dry! Excellent grip and I like having two different lengths in the set.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Rubber cushion handle is not heat resistant
customer_reviews.text: When there's so many good silicone kitchen utensils out there, we take for granted that black rubber-looking material will be as heat resistant as that material. The cushion handles on these tongs are not silicone, but thin rubber that is quickly melted and destroyed if allowed to get too close to a heat source. The structure and function of the tongs are not greatly affected, but they're quite ugly now.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: A+ Tongs. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Before getting these, I would constantly burn myself trying to flip bacon with my fingers. Now the only burns I get are from the contantly popping boiling bacon fat, because I am now cooking bacon all day every day. Absolute truckloads of bacon. My wife left me because I blew all of our savings on bacon, which I am currently cooking by campfire in a secluded part of the park in out town. I have no home, i have no family, all I have is bacon, and a set of specacular tongs to flip it with.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Harper

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Suprised by the Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts that these would be any good. After all, they are selling two tongs for the price you usually pay for one at most stores. However, I have to say, these are really nice! They feel heavy and solid in the hand. They open and close smoothly and I like the locking mechanism on these. All in all, I have no complaints. They are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: El Chupacabra

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cheap, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My favorite tongs so far. I bought a pair a long while ago and when I went to my parents’ house and saw the crappy ones they’re using I immediately thought of buying them a set. The best thing about these are that they aren’t flimsy. Of course as a chef I would prefer all metal, but the price point was too good to pass up. The best part is how closely the tips meet up so you can pick up the tiniest thing, like a slice of onion or a tiny mushroom. Seriously, I love these.
customer_reviews.author: yekaterina balagian

customer_reviews.title: Grill master weapon of choice
customer_reviews.text: Man these are great. No doubt you will feel like the grill master as you are clicking these bad boys while you make your approach to grill. They feel great in the hands and are very sturdy. The lock feature is second to none and feels like you are able to quick draw on the meat that's getting to just the right temp cooked. You can bask in all your glory when you use these to pull off the finished product from grill as your friends watch in envy. For you have the best there is.
customer_reviews.author: michael curry

customer_reviews.title: THESE TONGS ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.text: The DRAGONN Premium Sturdy, 2 set tongs-9" and 12" are brushed, stainless steel, and also lock.The handles are non- slip and are cushioned for comfort, with an added thumb rest. There is also a large hanging loop, which comes in handy-to put in a place, so you will not misplace it !! Thank You for a great product and also great service- 1) quick delivery and 2) items were packed well
customer_reviews.author: sweetbonita

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than indicated by the price.
customer_reviews.text: I like to have several tongs. There is always one available, even when the dishwasher hasn't run yet. I have one good silicone, and now two metal tongs. What a great value. If you have room for two, these are a great addition. The locking mechanism works great. The sizes are perfect for working on the stove top, reaching in the oven, tossing a salad, or getting pickles out of jars. Do you have little hands helping you in the kitchen? Give them the smaller ones to work next to you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Donahue

customer_reviews.title: Many uses!
customer_reviews.text: I use the larger one for grabbing laundry out of my washer. I have a top loader without the agitator and I am 5'3" and can not reach the clothes. Standing on a stool does not work as it makes me higher up. I decided to try these and they work great. They also are wonderful for the kitchen I have another set for cooking
customer_reviews.author: Beth A. Mistretta

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable value and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good pair of tongs for the price. I used the 9 inch tongs almost everyday for over more than a year and the silicone padding fell off recently. But the folding mechanism works just fine. The folding mechanism of a lot of cheaper tongs don't last that long and become totally unusable. This will be my second order of these tongs. I also appreciated the steel ends of the tongs. I try to avoid using utensils with plastic tips when dealing with hot foods.
customer_reviews.author: Green Beans

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lock, look good, perform as intended
customer_reviews.text: Tong Ta Tong Tong TOOOOOONG. They are tongs, the key parts are they work as intended. They lock and unlock easily but not so easy that you're fighting them locking on you as you use them. I didn't know if I'd actually use the shorter pair but have found them great for salads and such while the main duties of the larger one are relegated to the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Stuck

customer_reviews.title: very good quality, convenient locking device
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of tongs at a good price point. The only thing I found a bit of a concern was when storing the tongs in a bowl with the grippers facing up, the locking device would get pushed into the open position and release the lock. If the manufacturer would install a 1/4 turn slip post and notch on the locking shaft it would easily solve this problem.
customer_reviews.author: shrifty

customer_reviews.title: Still Strong Six Months Later
customer_reviews.text: Solid grip, lock opens and locks firmly and easily. Cleans thoroughly and no issues in dishwasher. Use one or the other, or both, every day. After six months of constant use and dishwashing (both top and bottom racks), they are just as expected. Would purchase again. Often use with mitts or a glove as well, when on BBG or working on food within the oven, with no loss of ease of use. Shipped inside a labeled protective cardboard box, with each set in its own protective plastic sleeve, with this set up within another outer container for shipping, and were exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grips fell off the 9" tongs after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these tongs at first, but after a few months the rubber grips fell off the 9" tongs. I tried gluing and other fixes, but nothing held. Looking at the design, I think the grommets that are supposed to hold the grips in place are too small. I did put these through the dishwasher many times. But they should be dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: m888

customer_reviews.title: Spring isn’t stainless steel and will break
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are stainless steel, but the spring inside is not. So guess what? The spring soon rusts and the tongs become useless.
customer_reviews.author: Decloud

customer_reviews.title: These are a great price and super high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are a great price and super high quality. We use tongs a lot so I wanted a few more. I like the closing mechanism. I've used both sizes a lot and have put them in the dishwasher multiple times and they still look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: BAS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for cheap
customer_reviews.text: I received both 9" and 12" tong in a box. The packaging is nothing fancy but adequate. As others described, these definitely feels light in hand. However, upon use both 9" and 12" are more than capable of picking up a 20oz steak without issues. The locking mechanism also works fine. I think these are great for its value.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sturdy, well made set of tongs and these are perfect. Having the two different lengths makes one perfect for use on my gas stove and the other for grilling outside. They arrived in 2 days and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Capecod3

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know how badly I needed these till I tried them!
customer_reviews.text: This set of 2 kitchen tongs was a pleasant surprise. High quality stainless steel, easy to use, easy to clean & an easy locking mechanism for storing. I will be getting more for gift giving. Excellent addition to any cook's kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Wrenn

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: These are great, look like good quality, and the locking mechanism is easy. The smaller ones are good for everyday kitchen use. The larger ones are pretty big, better for grilling or creating some distance from a flame.
customer_reviews.author: A. Faust

customer_reviews.title: Well made and hold up to heavy use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these tongs for over 2 years and they still look brand new. No rust, no staining, and the springs are as strong as day one. They lock in the closed position which makes storage easy and manageable. I definitely recommend these for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: JTEE31639

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Tongs
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these very long, but so far they are great. The material they are made of is strong and they don't bend or twist when using them. I like the locking feature for easy storage abilities. So far, my experience with these tongs rates "5" stars and I would recommend them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne SS

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy if I had seen them
customer_reviews.text: Thin gauge metal. Not premium. Most definitely not heavy duty. Not nearly as good as my ones with rubber ends but I needed something I could use with high heat. I wouldn't have bought these if I could have seen them first, and since I bought them I saw identical thing in local branch of big supermarket chain that had them for a lower price. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Product needs improvement on build quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these kitchen tongs. They are allegedly made of stainless steel. The tongs themselves do clean up very well in the dishwasher but the springs themselves are made of an inferior steel and have begin to severely rust, leaving stains on the tongs themselves. Surely the manufacturer could have spent a few more cents on a quality spring. The tongs are good and serviceable but the rusting springs pose a definite problem that is unsightly and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: King Chou Wong

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grips
customer_reviews.text: Quality assurance needs a little work, the set I recieved had issues locking and unlocking. After some bending and tweaking it now locks and unlocks smoothly. They work perfect as far as tongs go, and the rubber grips, although minor go a suprisingly long way with comfort I didn't know I needed or wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy locking mechanism!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a second to figure out where the locking mechanism was. Great idea on where they placed it at the very top of the handle instead of the middle without a hook or some type of clamp to hold it together. Very easy sliding mechanism on top! Very good for small barbecues or maybe midsize. Or maybe a deep fryer now there’s an idea!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie S

customer_reviews.title: Both broke in less then a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: These both broke extremely fast. They both broke in the same place too; the screw at the top snapped. Very disappointed...
customer_reviews.author: A Pittsburgh Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, I’ve been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Still using these after a few years, and no difference in terms of durability! Couldn’t be happier, considering the cost and how long it lasted. Through college and through lots of cooking during quarantine, sturdy, durable, and Trusty. No rest, and no change in the spring force. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the kitchen tongs for my granddaughter who has moved to her own apartment for school. She is very happy with the tongs, says they are easy to use, great quality, and they look great. She is happy enough with them that I plan to purchase a set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: Price..!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and only used it once. It works. You get 2 sizes for the price of one. Just to let you know I only going to be using it about 2 to 3 times a week at best. So it definitely a good buy. I'm not sure how long it will last but I'll update my review if anything happens.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Tong set at 1⁄2 the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my son a set of OXO tongs(highly rated by Americas Test Kitchen) as a Christmas present. They were for about $12 to $15 each. I realized I needed a set of quality tongs myself. I came across DRAGONN Premium 12-inch and 9-inch Stainless-Steel Locking Kitchen Tongs. I ordered them, and they are an excellent alternative at 1⁄2 the price of the OXO brand. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: John Aydelotte

customer_reviews.title: Tongs have everything that's important
customer_reviews.text: What is not to like? Stainless steel, has a lock to close and partially open as well as fully open. A short one that is perfect for serving salad, french fries, etc. and a long one for top of the range cooking. Thank goodness we have access to small businesses under the Amazon umbrella. I have never been disappointed in their products.
customer_reviews.author: Pacia

customer_reviews.title: Tongs
customer_reviews.text: The set of two tongs are well made and can be used in a variety of ways. I use mine mostly for my hot air fryer, much easier and safer to remove hot food from my fryer. Very pleased with the tongs.
customer_reviews.author: dbjordan

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: These tongs work well for tongs and do the job they're supposed to. Beware, however, the insides of the metal arms have extremely sharp edges that could easily slice open a finger when hand-washing. The parts are obviously stamped from a sheet of metal but not finished off very well. I'm looking for another pair of tongs to replace these.
customer_reviews.author: Stef J

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like these as they are metal from top to bottom with a nice hand grip area. The locking feature makes storage easier. Well made tongs. I think I made a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shane G

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: As a cook in the family I have found these to be the best tongs I've used in a long time. The rubber grips are comfortable and help to maintain control when handling food. the push-to-open feature feels durable and dependable. I like the two different sizes for different tasks. I tend to fry cook frequently and the long tongs are great for avoiding spatter from the oil. These have been run in the dishwasher many times with no visible signs of wear on the rubber. No rust buildup and the locking mechanism feels strong after moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler F.

customer_reviews.title: No slippery silicone tips
customer_reviews.text: I love these tongs! I had some silicone ones before but found that they didn’t grip food well because of the slippery surface. These work great are easy to lock/unlock and were so reasonably priced. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Torres

customer_reviews.title: Received a used/damaged set
customer_reviews.text: I received a set that had scratches and marks all over it. Naturally I wasn't pleased and retured it. This review is only for the product I received. Others may have a better experience and receive a set in a better condition.
customer_reviews.author: 123AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, poor finish, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: The silicone tips are flimsy, and the finish is poor. There is extra silicone sticking out of the edges because of imperfect molding or cutting. I have another tong with silicone tips and can clearly notice the difference. Do yourself a favor, spend $4 more and get some oher product that is three times better.
customer_reviews.author: Fabrício

customer_reviews.title: For the love of BACON, buy these tongs!!!
customer_reviews.text: My old tongs broke and bacon cooking just hasn't been the same. Sure, a spatula works, but its fiddly and harder to maneuver the bacon around the pan with any accuracy. These tongs are excellent quality, and perfect for cooking bacon. I like this style which has a push/pull locking mechanism in the hilt, making them easier to store in a drawer or canister.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Girl

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these multiple times in the past couple of weeks. The lock mechanism is easy to use and they feel super sturdy. I bought these looking for a replacement for some cheap ones that we had that finally broke on me. I have used both in many ways, from frying to just tossing pasta. I have washed by hand and also by top rack dish washing. Haven't had an issue yet, so great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Great Tongs, They Work Like a Tong Should, and That is Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice set of tongs. They are comfortable when holding and feel sturdy and well made. Would not hesitate to purchase again. They are a much higher quality than the tongs they replaced and after using them a few times, I wish I would have replaced my old ones sooner. These are one of those items that work well and when they do, you just don't think about it because it feels natural. Think they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ells

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Oh Dragonn Tongs.. where have you been all my life? I had a set of tongs I bought at target a few years ago - cheap but did the trick. Unfortunately, do to a particularly large cut of steak and several years of wear and tear, they died. I was thrilled when I got these and started using them - very sturdy, easy to wash and love love love the locking mechanism on these - definitely saves room in the utensil drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Liz M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy-duty tongs. I recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, sturdy all metal, and I love the fact that they stay closed in my utensil containers. I own other tongs (with silicone/rubber tips) from this company and they’ve been great!
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The old tongs wore out. These are just great. Very inexpensive. Work very well on the grill. Clean up easily, Close and hold tight so when you stick them in the drawer they do not come apart. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L

customer_reviews.title: Looking for no rust tongs? Look no farther.
customer_reviews.text: These tongs arrived several days ago and have already been used numerous times. I love the fact that the locking devise is easy to use and that I can hang them up if I want to. They are easy to clean and to use. I recommend these tongs for a no fuss, no muss experience while cooking especially when turning meat or tossing salads.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne O.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Tongs
customer_reviews.text: ....but not as nice as the OXO brand I have been buying over the years. The Dragonn design is very similar but the metal thickness is not as thick which makes the OXO jut more robust and has a better feel of quality. Thought I would take a chance on thee considering they are ~~1/2 the price of OXO -- but would rather have higher quality and pay the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gmasser

customer_reviews.title: @ for the price of 1
customer_reviews.text: These are almost identical to a previous pair of tongs I purchased. But I got 2 for the price of one! The only glitch is that I store them in a canister upside down and the locking mechanism isn't that tight so the tongs will open up. Then I have to lock them again and carefully set them in the utensil canister
customer_reviews.author: Gail V.

customer_reviews.title: Good kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: As a very new person to cooking, i dont k ow what tool i need. From the little i do know, the quality of my tools makes a difference in your result. These tools are proven themselves as the go to for many applications. Other than in pan that are sensitive or susceptible to scratching, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Biko

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! This price is great too. I like the different sizes. I have used mine and washed several times, I see no rust etc. They are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H

customer_reviews.title: Bad designed could be better
customer_reviews.text: It is already falling apart where It locks. Not very well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Reed

customer_reviews.title: grip it!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to the old tongs that I threw out these replacements will be 100% better, half the time with the old tongs they did not align which made it a challenge to pick anything up. I also like being able to pick up small foods, which my other tongs could'nt do at all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Haungs

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!!
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time today and didn't realize that spending a little extra would make such a difference in the quality!! The grip is great and really like the way they lock closed when putting away. NO more dollar store cheapo tongs for this guy I'm sold and will be checking out the remaining items in their product line.
customer_reviews.author: Larry N.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tongs to be used at my daughter's baby shower. They were perfect, no rubber or plastic to melt, and the ability to control whether or not they were opened or closed was a plus. I highly recommend these well made tongs to anyone who is looking for high quality tongs.
customer_reviews.author: B Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted, nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs as gifts for some of my kitchen mates who are always "borrowing" mine. After seeing these tongs, I'm going to let them keep my old set, these are much nicer. I don't use the lock feature so I didn't comment on it
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Breen

customer_reviews.title: Great for BBQ
customer_reviews.text: These are well built sturdy tongs that are all stainless steel. No stupid silicone on the ends. You get 2 pair in the order. They lock in the closed position and open up wide enough to pick up a thick steak or track of ribs. Love these. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mollypie

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret getting them
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say anything about durability, as I got them recently. Sturdy, handy and practical they are. A good price in addition. Had been looking for similar tongs but not found them until now. Go and get them!
customer_reviews.author: grumpy

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tongs for my Ninja Foodi, that I love. These tongs are amazing and more than I expected. High quality. Locking and unlocking mechanism is simple, easy to use, and long to keep your hand away from the heat. They are also easy to clean. Highly recommended for the Ninja Foodi and other non-stick situations.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Streeter

customer_reviews.title: They're tongs.
customer_reviews.text: After about 2 years of use, the round rubber on the ring "wore" off, but only in the smaller tong. Of course we use the smaller tongs about 90% of the time. We also hang them on hooks, which might have contributed to the wear. A better design would be to have a harder plastic-y type cover on the ring end. Still 5 star. They're tongs. Everyone needs at least one, and the fact that you get two for a good price is cool.They lock closed by pulling out the loop on the end, which is handy to hang them on wall hooks with.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the quality of these compared to the price. The seem very sturdy. The rubber grips are comfortable and help me hold on even when my hands are a little greasy. I also like the hold close feature. The fully close the tongs to make them easy to slip into the drawer without catching on other utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Schupbach

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: I like the locking feature ita pretty slick. Easy to clean. They work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these tongs because I needed some & they had great reviews. I was not disappointed. These are sturdy tongs & are fantastic lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Erin W. McCall

customer_reviews.title: VERY HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have a drawer full of tongs that I bought and did not like. I hate trying to use any of them. These Dragonn tongs are AWESOME! I can't believe the quality of them for the low price! I threw away all of the other ones and will use only these two. They open perfectly, close when needed, and they are heavy duty. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Maye

customer_reviews.title: Great so far.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. The business is also great and I feel like if these break, warp, etc...they will replce no questions ask. Would buy from buyer again. Only time will tell if the sting rusts out. That is the main reason for buying these every five years or so.
customer_reviews.author: LAinSFLA

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for many months and they are always washed in the dishwasher (at least once a week). They are not fading or showing any signs of wear from dishwashing or normal use. Will probably last many years. I like that the ends are not plastic coated like some others. I've melted those styles before (my fault for leaving in cooking pan) hence the reason I ended up with these.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Desai

customer_reviews.title: Good Tongs - Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Good tongs for the price. I had hoped for one a bit shorter in length like perhaps 7 inch. But these are good for the price. I'm glad they don't have those silicone coverings over the pick up end. Those the covers make it difficult to pick up anything with them. I realize they are supposed to help with non-stick pans but most of those pans nowadays don't require such delicate handling. Anyway, these do not have those annoying silicone covers on the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Great for the barbecue
customer_reviews.text: Works great on the barbecue grill and wife says the same for non stick pans.
customer_reviews.author: Squid

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: These tongs are very well made.Heavy duty stainless steel and very easy to lock and unlock.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki & Chaz Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great tongs
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about these because they're so cheap, but they are awesome. The mechanism that keeps them closed is great. You squeeze them shut and pull the hanging ring out and they stay shut. When you're ready to use them, just push that ring down and they unlatch.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the set for the locking feature. Works better than the ring type that slips and locks when trying to serve or cook. Comfortable grip. Easy to clean design.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice Brown

customer_reviews.title: Seller will spam your email.
customer_reviews.text: These are tongs, as advertised. Nothing special, nothing bad. Why one star? The seller continually spams my email asking for a review. If I had it to do over again, I'd find another seller.
customer_reviews.author: BlackhawkFan

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack
customer_reviews.text: My favorite thing about these is it comes with two. Its convent to have multiple options on size, product is durable and I like the open and close release it offers.
customer_reviews.author: Steelrfan4ever

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  Falling apart within a month, silicon in your food
customer_reviews.text: Started falling apart in a month. The silicon ended up in our food. Says a lifetime warranty but I got no response from the seller. Cant even figure out how to get help from Amazon since its outside the 30 day return window. DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: I like em
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. You can grab food that's hot. You can grab food that's cold. You can grab food so your hands don't get dirty. You can close them fast so it makes a satisfying sound, and then use that sound to act like your going to grab your child's nose and chase them around the kitchen while they scream and run to mommy but then you start doing it to momma and they start screaming louder then your wife gives you a look like "Really! Now I have to deal with this screaming kid while you get to walk away and dinner better be ready soon or so help me God!"
customer_reviews.author: Wookiee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. I like the silicone grips on these tongs. Hope they last awhile. Edit: I forgot to add that I like the locking mechanism on these tongs. Much superior to the square rings on some other tongs I've previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Maria G

customer_reviews.title: Will likely end up purchasing again.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Second time around purchasing these tongs because I loved them so much the first time. Made the mistake of leaving them in the restaurant for the rest of the team to use so they ended up disappearing. Both of them. I use the smaller tongs on the line and the larger tongs stay tucked away comfortable in my bag. If you arent careful then the rubber grips will come loose, but I've managed to keep mine on so far by simply paying attention and taking care. Very sturdy feel and good weight in the hand. Convenient locking mechanism makes for simple storage and looks great. I have a go-to when it comes to tongs and it's Dragonn.
customer_reviews.author: jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the BBQ outside. They work great. Very solid and can take the abuse of being outside.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lion-Transler

customer_reviews.title: Tongs of good reasons to buy these!
customer_reviews.text: They look great, they work great. I've left them in dish water overnight and still no rust or staining. I've run them through the dishwasher and still no rust or staining. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teej

customer_reviews.title: Must have durable tongs
customer_reviews.text: I have this product at home and wanted to purchase another for Christmas for a family member. I was so happy to find it online for a great price. I was also thrilled to see it sold in a two pack with two different sizes. It’s a very durable product. Shipping was very fast and product was exactly as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Nat B.

customer_reviews.title: JUST what I needed. BEST quality!
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are just as I hoped. My mom being a professional cook, I got used to professional cooking tools and tend to purchase from restaurant supply stores. These are NOT cheaply made. They're beautifully constructed and will last me forever. They stay in the open position and have loops that I can use to hang them. The claw part will not bend like the junk tongs they sell in the supermarket. They're the 2 sizes I need most. Both pair for the right price. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Troy

customer_reviews.title: Great set of tongs!
customer_reviews.text: This set of tongs seems to be one of the best we've owned. Very good quality and holds all foods well!
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: My favorite part is the brand name
customer_reviews.text: My favorite part is the brand name, then the part were I can pull the tab to keep the tongues closed. I've been using these to cook steaks so they see a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Smart design
customer_reviews.text: These are decent tongs, I have no complaints, but what really stands out is the locking mechanism. Other tongs have that ring that slides down over the tongs, which does it's job but it just seems like a clumsy way to do it. With these you just pull the ring at the top and they're locked, and the ring also acts as a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: While I like these tongs with the silicone tips, my husband what these for his outside griddle. I can definitely see how they would work better for that. They are perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to grip and use
customer_reviews.text: Just used the rings for the 1st time and.liked them very much - I have a weak grip and these tongs were very easy to use. Since I have only just started using them I cannot comment on their durability
customer_reviews.author: E. Billingslea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to USE
customer_reviews.text: These are very easy to use and grip food. I also like the extra grippers on the side so your hands or fingers do not slip and slide. Great Product and worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and easy to use. Easy to lock and unlock. I use the smaller one in the kitchen and the bigger one on the grill. They work as expected. I also like that they lock/unlock easily but do not unlock unless you WANT them to. Great value
customer_reviews.author: MB Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Good spring. Nice lock. Quality feel.
customer_reviews.text: These have a good spring resistance and the hinge it tight. Maybe it will loosen over time (hope not), but for now I like these. The rubber grips make a nice difference. Really good value for the $$.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery45

customer_reviews.title: very nice tongs
customer_reviews.text: These were much better quality than the ones I was replacing. Very satisfied with my order.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is suppose to do...
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality item that does what it sets out to do. Locking mechanisms work well. No issues with rusting. Make sure you dry them well after washing. Some of the grooves are difficult to get a towel into so I find hanging them to air dry after a shake works well.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M Byer

product_meta.title: DRAGONN Premium Set of 12-inch and 9-inch Stainless-Steel Locking Kitchen Tongs, Set of 2 - Sturdy, Heavy Duty Tong Set - Great for Cooking, Grilling, and Barbecue (BBQ) (Silver) (DN-KW-TG2S)
feature_bullets: TOP QUALITY - This DRAGONN kitchen tongs set is constructed from top quality brushed stainless steel and comes in the only two sizes you'll ever need, 12" and 9"! Great versatility that can be used for all your cooking, grilling, or barbecue (BBQ) needs!
EASY-TO-USE - Our kitchen tongs are cushioned and have non-slip handles and thumb rests. The gently raised edges provide the perfect grip, ensuring that food arrives on your plate, not the table.
SAFETY FIRST - Lift and flip on the grill easily and safely with these heavy duty steel tongs! Avoid germs and prevent the risk of burns by using these fantastic 12 and 9 inch Kitchen Tongs!
EASY TO CLEAN AND STORE - Our premium kitchen tong set has large hanging loops on the ends for easy storage, and it's dishwasher safe.
SIMPLE LOCKING MECHANISM - Simply click the tongs closed, and slip them in a drawer for space saving storage.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,956 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
